name: Adib Bagus Sudiyono
role: Jr. Full Stack Developer | Graphic Designer

about.aboutMe: A graduate of Informatics Engineering from Ahmad Dahlan University, specialized in software development. Experienced in front-end development, academic administration management, and website optimization. Proficient in teamwork, SDLC methodology implementation, with additional skills in graphic design and video editing.

experience.title: Trainee of Mobile App Development with React Native (Progate)
experience.subtitle: Digital Talent Scholarship - KOMINFO
experience.description: As a Trainee of Mobile App Development with React Native in the FGA program by Digital Talent Kominfo in collaboration with Progate, I am learning the essential skills for building mobile apps using React Native. With guidance from industry experts, I am gaining practical knowledge to kickstart my career in this field.

experience.title: Student Employee
experience.subtitle: Universitas Ahmad Dahlan, Yogyakarta, DIY
experience.description:
• Handled administration and academic needs for students and faculty in the Vocational Teacher Education Master's Program.
  • Updated information and implemented SEO on the program's website.

experience.title: Trainee of Junior Web Developer
experience.subtitle: Balai Pelatihan dan Pengembangan Teknologi Informasi dan Komunikasi
experience.description: Completed an intensive training program focused on modern web technologies and development practices. Gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, and Bootstrap. Worked on real-world projects to develop responsive and interactive web interfaces, enhancing both technical and teamwork skills.

experience.title: Front-end Developer (Internship)
experience.subtitle: ARPATEAM, Bantul, DIY
experience.description:
• Developed responsive user interfaces (UI) using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
  • Created and refined graphic assets, including icons, graphics, and background images.

achievements: Chief of Scout (Pradana) SMK Diponegoro Banyuputih, 2017 – 2018
Ranked 2nd as the best graduate in Computer and Network Engineering at SMK Diponegoro Banyuputih
